title: TiKV panic when running PiTR log backup

### What version of TiKV are you using?

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
CentOS 16U

### Steps to reproduce
1. Start a log backup task
2. Wait and check log backup status

### What did you expect?
TiKV should not panic

### What did happened?
TiKV panic
